name: 0.9.0-alpha5
body:
### ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png) RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe).
Many thanks for your help and stay tuned! [Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.9.0-alpha4...0.9.0-alpha5) ### New features and improvements: - #3333: Implement '--settings-dir ./foobar/' command line option - Migrate to Qt 5.9 ### Fixes: - Remove explicit redis-server checks #3891 - Fix value formatters and JSON parsing #3823 and #3901 - Fix #3897: Remove value types combobox in Add row modal window - Fix #3868: Do not open seerver info tab by default - Fix #3885: Clean up keys filter - Fix #3894: Add qt5-qtcharts-devel to deps - Fix #3896: Value field is editable when row is not selected - Fix #3899: Default values are stored in settings after 1st run - Fix #3898: Reduce height of Settings dialog to fit on 13" Mac - Fix #3887: Remove useless scroll bars in treeview - FIx #3884: IF ZSET 's score is 0, the display value is nothing - Fix #3900: Buttons are too big on key Filter menu - Fix #3737: Save button is hidden on Value editor tab - Fix #3780 and #3676: Handle Redis error messages -DENIED, -LOADING, -MISCONF - Fix #3867: Use different MessageDialog to show errors from Connection

name: 0.9.0-alpha4
body:
### ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png) RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe).
Many thanks for your help and stay tuned! [Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.9.0-alpha3...0.9.0-alpha4) ### New features and improvements: - Add initial implementation of Native Formatters (#3534) - Add support for Pub/Sub commands in console - Remove build-in zlib compression/decompression - Remove php-unserialize.js formatter - Remove msgpack.js formatter - Update translations - Improve connections dialog - Remove qgamp and clean code - Migrate to Qt 5.8 - Change breakpad origin to github ### Fixes: - Fix issue #3732: RDM shows invalid error message when trying to connect to invalid host/port - Fix issue #3758: RDM Shows Key Values for One Key Only - Fix tree rendering with multi-char NS - Fix issue #3724: Load NS seperator from connection settings in NS deletion - Fix #3691: RDM doesn't fade deleted keys & namespaces - Fix issue #3791: Model doesn't hide removed row on page > 1

body:
### ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png) RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe).
Many thanks for your help and stay tuned! [Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.9.0-alpha2...0.9.0-alpha3) ## New features: ### Redis Cluster and Sentinel support: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/20009556/a0b14b0c-a2ad-11e6-9359-f2147ab412b1.png) ### Change app language from settings: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/20009279/868116a0-a2ac-11e6-9b2c-3a378798f398.png) ### CN and TW translations - thanks to @Jerry-Shaw ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/20009649/fc39dab6-a2ad-11e6-8af6-c520adbde03b.png) You can improve it here https://www.transifex.com/redisdesktopmanager/redisdesktopmanager/

name: 0.9.0-alpha1
body:
## ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png)  RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe). Many thanks for your help and stay tuned!

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/ef326bee8fb95157b64ce937f68a5234d15b85b8...0.9.0-alpha1)

## New features:

### New UI of main window and connection tree optimized for touchpad

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/18475854/b320e97e-79d0-11e6-8963-c8c0b3bcc78f.png)

### Live update of tree with namespaces reopenning

![virtualbox_win10_13_09_2016_16_41_42](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/18475996/2359c8b4-79d1-11e6-8ecf-cc52930bfc46.png)

### New smart filter [WIP]

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/18476193/c11dc0dc-79d1-11e6-8622-90c5f975c367.png)

### Copy key name from connections tree

![virtualbox_win10_13_09_2016_16_50_15](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/18476510/0e0e7566-79d3-11e6-80ca-f7839149881f.png)

### Settings Dialog

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/18476261/01ba58f8-79d2-11e6-8f6e-f255f052e10f.png)

## ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png)  RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe). Many thanks for your help and stay tuned!

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.8-beta...0.8.8)

### New features:

[See here](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/releases/tag/0.8.8-beta)

### Fixes:
- Fixed regression in Connections Tree and Value editor (#3679)
- Add support for Ubuntu 16 in `configure` script
- Fix issues with SSH tunnel on Linux (#3568)

### Improvements:
- Show key bytes length and value bytes length #3677

### [Download builds for OS X and Ubuntu](https://redisdesktop.com/download)

name: 0.8.8-beta
body:
## ![rocket](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737396/96b280c2-6495-11e6-99e6-7d57d73a460c.png)  RedisDesktopManager is driven by our [supporters and contributors](https://redisdesktop.com/subscribe). Many thanks for your help and stay tuned!

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.7-1...0.8.8-beta)

### New features:

#3546 Flush database 
![flush-db](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737824/7ce70652-6497-11e6-935b-a3075e6aaf0b.png)

#3433 Sorting in Value Table
![sorting](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17738100/86832c6c-6498-11e6-9f82-d1728bc83060.png)

#67 Search in sets, hashes and lists
![search](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17738214/0c10ce0c-6499-11e6-9f59-78c2f2b7648e.png)

### Fixes:
- #3666 Incorrect rendering of some key names
- #3649 When RDM reconnects it doesnt reselect DB
- #3641 Keys in JSON viewer are wrong
- #3625 RDM getting crashing on big string
- #3526 crash on json value size 600k

## ![power](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/17737510/11b87894-6496-11e6-871b-de89a2c718a0.png) [Beta Builds are exclusively available for Supporters and Contributors.](https://redisdesktop.com/download)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.7...0.8.7-1)

Fix issue #3665:  Opening DB with lots of keys hangs

#### For Windows 7 Users:

 If you see `api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll is missing` error please install  Windows Update KB2999226. [More Info](http://stackoverflow.com/a/36299632/2823675)

### [Download builds for OS X and Ubuntu](https://redisdesktop.com/download)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.6...0.8.7)

## New features:
- ### #89 Delete namespaces from db (thanks to @plamendp and @cbigsby)
  
  ![rdm_del_ns1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/16927271/32c305fe-4d35-11e6-8700-c8343ef2f643.png)
  ![2016-07-18_2217](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/16927318/663f71ba-4d35-11e6-831e-9e74e41b3387.png)
- ### #2564 Remove key from connections tree (thanks to @defmys)
  
  ![rdm_del_key1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/16927349/87656570-4d35-11e6-8cb9-136a791255f3.png)

## Fixes:
- Fix SSL support and connection dialog. [Now connection to Azure requires only checkbox selection. ]
- Use latest qredisclient with fixed memory leaks.

# [Download builds for OS X and Ubuntu](https://redisdesktop.com/download)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.5...0.8.6)

**Fixes:**
Fix issue #3626: Windows tabs are all black background via RDP
Fix issue #3587: Windows build crash at startup
Add installation of missing VS2015 redist package in Windows installer

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.4...0.8.5)

**Fixes:**
Fix issue #3623: Value tabs is not usable after renaming key to one that exists - thanks to @defmys

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.3...0.8.4)

**Improvements:**
Updated [qredisclient](https://github.com/uglide/qredisclient): Fixed memory leak

**Fixes:**
Fix issue #2506: GUI layout issues with high DPI monitors 
Fix issue #3601: Fix link to quick start tutorial in app dialog
Fix issue #3598: can not show add new key dialog on multi-screen
Fix issue #3588: key doesn't want to be deleted
Fix #3560: Migrate windows builds on msvc2015 & qt 5.6
Fix #3552: Error: Invalid PHP Serialized String when viewing keys holding raw HTML values

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.2...0.8.3)

**Improvements:**
Updated [qredisclient](https://github.com/uglide/qredisclient): Fixed growing memory consumption in Connection class

**Fixes:**
Fix issue #3528: Some keys are not showing up [Critical]
Fix issue #3523: Invalid version detection of unstable redis-server
Fix issue #3518: Scores are being written in scientific notation
Fix multiple issues in Add New Key dialog

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.1...0.8.2)

**Improvements:**
Improvement #3510: HASH Key add view formatter, similar to HASH Value

**Fixes:**
Fix issue #3506: PHP-Serializer value view Error
Fix issue #3513: No ability to resize value pane
Fix issue #3517

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-release...0.8.1)

**Fixes:**
- Fix issue #3504: RDM runs with 100% CPU core utilization
- Fix issue #3503: Going from page 1 to page 2 in list blocks UI
- Fix issue #3502: JSON encoded string containing \x0A is treated as binary
- Fix issue #3505: JSON objects in lists are truncated in list view
- Fix typo in welcome screen (thanks to @madebyherzblut)
- Fix item delegate in value table
- Do not fallback to hex for plain values

name: 0.8.0 Release
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-rc4...0.8.0-release)

![screenshot from 2015-10-13 21 16 18](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1655867/10463969/1b6579b2-71f0-11e5-91b1-cd25122a9fa1.png)

**Improvements:**
- RedisClient module was improved and moved to separate [repository](https://github.com/uglide/qredisclient)  
- Implement #3310: Autodetect value format
- Implement #3491: Create hot keys for context menu options in connection tree
- Implement #1738: Support escaped characters in quoted strings in Console
- Implement #3472: Simplify compiling on OSX
- Implement #3481: Display the number keys inside each namespace, recursively. (thanks to @dmagliola)
- Escape binary strings in value table

**Fixes:**
- Fix issue #3466: Problem with MSGPACK formatter
- Fix issue #3496: Add binary-keys support
- Fix issue #3456: Tree-View truncate key names
- Fix issue #3457: Console -> Select all and delete
- Fix issue #3328: Reload key-tree after adding new key
- Fix issue #3475: Add key loading indication
- Fix issue #3479: Busy indicator blocks String value editor
- Fix issue #3483: Overlap of column values
- Fix issue #3464: Add shortcut in Windows start menu
- Fix issue #3488: Deploy opengl32sw.dll
- Fix fixed typo in installer (thanks to @marcel-burkhard )
- Fix issue #3486: Use long long for ttl values
- Fix issue #3496: Add binary-keys support

name: 0.8.0 Release candidate 4
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-rc3...0.8.0-rc4)

**Improvements:**
- Implement #71: Control connections tree by keyboard

**Fixes:**
- Fix issue #3442: Namespace separator not saved. 
- Fix issue #3440: Cannot load key value if key contains space
- Fix issue #3432: Add size of hash/set/zset/list
- Fix issue #3450: Issue with viewing the details of a list item
- Fix issue #3452: Can't add/edit empty hash value
- Fix issue #3445: Show error message when SCAN command failed
- Fix issue #3446: Browse file buttons don't work in SSL tab
- Fix issue #3448: List item is red sometimes

name: 0.8.0 Release candidate 3
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-rc2...0.8.0-rc3)

**Improvements:**
- Awesome performance of connection-tree (renders up to 10x faster)

**Fixes:**
- Add missed fix for connection config

name: 0.8.0 Release candidate 2
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-rc1...0.8.0-rc2)

**Improvements:**
- Improved behaviour of loading database list #3417, #3429 and #28 

**Fixes:**
- Fixed issues in config migration (from XML to JSON config) #3407 and #3418
- Fixed multiple crashes #3419 and #3425
- Fixed issue with plain text view in value editor #3423
- Fix compilation problems on Fedora 22 #3412
- Fix links in Welcome tab #3430

name: 0.8.0 Release candidate 1
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-beta2...0.8.0-rc1)

**New features:**
- Migrate from XML to JSON config connections.xml -> connections.json (Import from XML still works, but deprecated) [#3389](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3345)
- Automatic gzip decompression/recompression of values. **Thanks to [wildcatgerry](https://github.com/wildcatgerry)**
- Key filtering (back-ported from 0.7.6 and moved to database context menu)

**Improvements:**
- Memory usage in connection tree was reduced up to -40%
- Improved error handling in value editor 

**Fixes:**
- Fix problems with unicode in connections tree (#3368)
- Fixed multiple issues in value editor (#3402, #3382, #3374)
- Fixed multiple problems in console module (#3314, #3341, Copy-paste formatting issue)
- Fixed crashes in connection tree and value editor
- Fixed issues with OSX bundle and Windows installer

name: 0.8.0-beta2
body:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.8.0-beta1...0.8.0-beta2)

**New features:**
- Add SSL support [#3345](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3345)

**Fixed bugs:**
- Links on Wellcome tab are not clickable  [#3343](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3343)
- RDM does not work with Azure Redis Cache servers [#3312](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3312)
- Create installation smoke-tests for supported target env's [#3342](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3342)
- Improve compiling process on Fedora [#3331](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3331)

**Merged pull requests:**
- Change ConnectionWindow window style [#3340](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/3340) ([valistar](https://github.com/valistar))

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/compare/0.7.6...0.8.0-beta1)

**Implemented enhancements:**
- value window doesn't display binary redis values [#2228](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2228)
- unbelievably slow on large instances [#2210](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2210)
- Fix numeration in value grid [#1927](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1927)
- Value contains zero-bytes ("\x00") can not be displayed correctly [#1893](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1893)
- Implement reconnection to the host if connection error occurred [#1851](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1851)
- Fix Breakpad reporter [#1816](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1816)
- F5 keystroke handler [#1730](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1730)
- OSX: connections.xml is stored in user home and is left with mode 0644 [#1645](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1645)
- Natural sorting in database list [#1315](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1315)
- Add support of SCAN commands for better performance [#52](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/52)
- SSH keys support [#32](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/32)

**Fixed bugs:**
- Select command doesn't work with index greater than 9 [#3332](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3332)
- Fix app window size [#3329](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3329)
- rdm GUI freezes on Mac OS [#3315](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3315)
- The program without reaction after run for a while [#2984](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2984)
- On Mac OS X Mavericks I see only hash keys - not values [#2528](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2528)
- Consecutive Namespace Separator Bug [#2216](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2216)
- Never ending loading values [#2208](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2208)
- console prompt problem -2014-07-08 10:54 +0800 [#2135](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2135)
- Connection list freezes after redis server stopped. [#1892](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1892)
- Connection name doesn't update immediately in connections tree [#1852](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1852)
- Connection disconnect doesn't work [#1850](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1850)
- Connection reloading doesn't work [#1849](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1849)
- Ok button in connection dialog adds two connections [#1848](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1848)
- Cannot setup connection [#1847](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1847)
- Fix Breakpad reporter [#1816](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1816)
- Fix build for Debian 7 i386 [#1811](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1811)
- SSH connection problems [#1611](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1611)
- Fix parsing commands in console [#1583](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1583)
- distortion code, wo can't read [#678](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/678)

**Closed issues:**
- Console select where db is 10 or over fails [#3339](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3339)
- Create build documentation and update Install & Run wiki page [#3337](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3337)
- RedisDesktopManager Can be used for centos? [#3334](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3334)
- Connection timeout [#3327](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3327)
- No hash value display if field is XML [#3325](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3325)
- Ability to delete a hash / sorted set / set entry (HDEL, SREM, ZREM) [#3324](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3324)
- No exist field for private key in tab SSH tunnel of connection window in RDM for windows [#3323](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3323)
- List bug? [#3320](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3320)
- Recursive parsing of MultiBulk replies not supported [#3318](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3318)
- add refresh/reload button  [#3309](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3309)
- move ~/connections.xml to ~/.rdm/connections.xml [#3307](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3307)
- You will got  ERR syntax error if you have blank in you value [#3304](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3304)
- clicking on a sorted set with millions of rows causes a long wait and then a crash [#3283](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3283)
- Mac has no option for ssh key [#3160](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/3160)
- CJK characters in keys and values are not displayed correctly [#2886](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2886)
- Can't install from source [#2836](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2836)\- selecting more than a single key [#2724](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2724)
- Spelling error [#2664](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2664)
- Rpush or some command 'white space' bug [#2653](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2653)
- Readme.md - Other Linux section - not functional [#2636](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2636)
- Keyboard Shortcut for Refreshing [#2630](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2630)
- build failed in windows  [#2573](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2573)
- Can't create VPN Tunnel (ssh) on Mac [#2572](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2572)
- Implement QML based value tab [#2563](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2563)
- Fix remove connection feature [#2562](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2562)
- Fix edit connection feature [#2561](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2561)
- ssh tunnel [#2556](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2556)
- MSGPACK viewer in value viewer [#2519](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2519)
- Not showing hash value [#2470](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2470)
- could not support space char [#2462](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2462)
- No support for binary keys [#2454](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2454)
- Various small issues 0.7.6, windows build [#2393](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2393)
- private key field doesn't appear on ubuntu 14.04 [#2353](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2353)
- Add support for MsgPack in addition to plaintext and JSON [#2304](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2304)
- Crash on value update [#2252](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2252)
- Remember value display style [#2059](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/2059)\- Improve pagination [#1923](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1923)
- Allow definition of root namespaces of interest [#1872](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1872)\- Quotation marks. [#1860](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1860)
- Keys filtering [#1858](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1858)
- Publish development builds on site [#1856](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1856)
- Fix quick-start guide [#1854](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1854)
- Implement welcome dialog with reference to quick start guide [#1853](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1853)
- Feature Request: support editing values in key-value pairs [#1846](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1846)\- Hex Value format [#1843](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1843)
- what charset do this tool use?  It can't see chinese language [#1718](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1718)
- User Setting to view string value as JSON [#1701](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1701)
- No way to refresh collection [#1689](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1689)
- RFE: Default to JSON view for key glob match [#1628](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1628)
- Redesign network core [#1589](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1589)
- Drop Visual studio project file support [#1588](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1588)
- Migrate on Qt 5.3.X [#1587](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1587)
- Connection test in connection dialog [#1584](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1584)
- Can't run rdm [#1575](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1575)\- No of keys missing in remote host connection [#1523](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1523)
- Problem running rdm on Ubuntu 12.04 x64 [#1483](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1483)
- RDM fails to start: libQt5concurrent.so.5 [#1471](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1471)
- libQt [#1470](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1470)
- Is there a shortcut to delete? [#1391](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/1391)
- PHP-Serializer value-view formatter [#50](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/50)
- Adding new key  [#29](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/issues/29)

**Merged pull requests:**
- support bin8,bin16,bin32 decode; fix map decode [#3338](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/3338) ([huangwei1024](https://github.com/huangwei1024))
- Delete version.h [#3317](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/3317) ([uglide](https://github.com/uglide))
- Tidy debian packaging [#3316](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/3316) ([lamby](https://github.com/lamby))
- Fixes typo [#2994](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/2994) ([ksatirli](https://github.com/ksatirli))
- Update English [#1909](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/1909) ([outrunthewolf](https://github.com/outrunthewolf))
- use the "enter" key to do the search [#1857](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/1857) ([wsgfz](https://github.com/wsgfz))
- Support quotes strings in Console [#1715](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/1715) ([maxwellb](https://github.com/maxwellb))
- Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md [#3311](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/3311) ([gitter-badger](https://github.com/gitter-badger))
- waffle.io Badge [#1855](https://github.com/uglide/RedisDesktopManager/pull/1855) ([waffle-iron](https://github.com/waffle-iron))

name: 0.7.6 - "Early spring"
body:
### New features
- New tab in connection dialog
- System console/log
- Display key expiration time

### Fixes:
- Fixed issue with SSH tunnel 
- Fixed font issues on Ubuntu and Debian
- Fixed reload crash
- Fixed crash on deleting keys

name: Major fixes
body:
**Fixes**:
- Bug #48 - os x freeze (and eat 100% cpu) 
- Bug #49 - Localhost: (error: Unknown Error) on connect

**New features**:
- Added support of old redis versions 2.2 & 2.4
- Added support of cloud & shared redis instances (Issue #47)
- Implemented disconnect from server (issue #46)
